comment.author: 29350288@N06
comment._content: A fine New Orleans jazz trumpeter, bandleader, and early master of jive, Joseph Manone aquired the nickname "Wingy" after losing an arm in a childhood streetcar accident. However he liked telling people it was short for "Wingston". He was a real character in addition to a fine musician. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wingy_Manone
